Enumeration.Description: Gain selector for parameter Gain allows to select different type of gains.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.Description: Vertical Binning - number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.Description: Horizontal Binning - number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine vertical pixel together.

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal pixel together.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationVertical
Enumeration.Description: Vertical Decimation - vertical sub-sampling of the image - reduces the vertical resolution of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.

Enumeration.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Enumeration.Description: Horizontal Decimation - horizontal sub-sampling of the image - reduces the horizontal resolution of the image by the specified vertical decimation factor.
Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern type is generated by the selected generator.

Group.Float: > Compression Region Gain dB Expert compression_region_gainReg compression_region_gainMinReg compression_region_gainMaxReg
